Package com.project.dao.users

Class UsersDaoInFile

java.lang.Object
com.project.dao.users.UsersDaoInFile
All Implemented Interfaces:
CrudDao<User>, UsersDao
@Component("UsersDaoInFile") public class UsersDaoInFile extends Object implements UsersDao
Class for working with storage of users in a file that implements the UsersDao interface
